synopsis:
Koji Morimoto, the acclaimed Studio 4Â°C co-founder who worked on The Animatrix, Genius Party, and Memories, directed an animated music video for the electro rock band Masterlink. The music video is for "Super Speed," the title track on the band's second CD single. Morimoto had previously worked on music videos for Ken Ishii, Hikaru Utada, Glay, System 7, Genki Rockets, Tamurapan, and others. 
(Source: ANN)
